channel.title: Hello on Revanth Gundala

item.title: Open source is broken
item.description: How do we fix open source? Software is the only industry where we can just pull something off the shelf for free and directly use it in the products we make. This allows software to move extremely fast compared to the rest of the world. However, there’s obviously a lot of downsides to this.
